title: Design of a double-layered material as a long-acting moisturizing hydrogel–elastomer and its application in the field protection of elephant ivories excavated from the Sanxingdui Ruins
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,24845-24855
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA03919J, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Lang Jiang, Shilin Xiang, Xiaoying Ji, Jinshan Lei, Dongliang Li, Sifan Li, Lin Xiao, Luman Jiang, Lijuan Zhao, Yi Wang
Hydrogel-elastomer possess long-term moisture retention and superior mechanical properties. It offers a transparent, flexible, strong alternative for effective protection of wet cultural relics like unearthed ivory.
